title: SEO Intern
aboutUs: At PayME, our mission is to transform the financial landscape by delivering secure, transparent, and decentralized payment solutions through blockchain technology. We aim to build a world where every transaction is safe, seamless, and trustworthy—empowering businesses and individuals to take full control of their financial activities.
roleOverview: We’re seeking an SEO Intern to assist in optimizing our web presence, improving search rankings, and increasing organic traffic. You’ll work closely with our marketing team to implement SEO best practices.
skills: Basic understanding of search engine optimization (SEO) techniques.
Familiarity with keyword research tools like Google Keyword Planner or SEMRush.
Understanding of content strategy and its impact on SEO.
Basic experience with Google Analytics and other web metrics tools.
bonus_skills: Experience with SEO tools (e.g., Moz, Ahrefs).
Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS and website structure.
perks: Opportunity to work on live projects.

title: AWS Intern
aboutUs: At PayME, we are committed to delivering secure and decentralized payment solutions through blockchain technology, empowering businesses and individuals with seamless financial control.
roleOverview: Managing AWS resources to ensure our clients experience seamless user interactions.
skills: Familiarity with Load Balancers and Auto Scaling.
Experience with DynamoDB, RDBMS, and SNS.
Experience with S3 buckets and Route 53.
perks: Opportunity to work on live projects.

title: Junior Developer
aboutUs: At PayME, we strive to redefine the financial landscape by leveraging blockchain technology to create secure and transparent payment systems.
roleOverview: We’re looking for a Junior Backend Developer to develop and enhance our existing solutions.
skills: Proficiency in Node.js and JavaScript frameworks.
perks: Opportunity to work on live projects.
